skin.tone: warm golden tan to light tan

facial_characteristics.face_shape_tendency: oval to heart-shaped with balanced proportions
facial_characteristics.nose_tendency: refined bridge with softly defined tip
facial_characteristics.lip_tendency: medium to full with natural softness

aesthetic_bias.cultural_context: contemporary Vietnamese aesthetic with traditional grace

hair_characteristics.color_tendency: deep black to dark brown with warm undertones
hair_characteristics.volume_tendency: medium to thick with natural body

guardrails: avoid overly pale or cool-toned skin
